• Collaborate with product and UX teams to outline research plans, execute research, consolidate findings, and present meaningful insightsPlan, design, and lead research strategy that inform business, product and design decisions for multiple product areas in a domainDefine and consolidate quantitative and qualitative research, including surveys, usability studies, field studies, and more to provide insights on requirements definition, content strategy, wireframes, visual and interaction designWork closely with partners across multiple teams to clearly define and prioritize user research needs and lead efforts to execute on necessary researchIdentify and recommend the best methods to answer research questions and prioritize them according to schedule and opportunity constraintsActively find opportunities to improve the user experience across your business domainEstimate work effort and define work plans and research project timelinesPresent actionable, creative, compelling insights and recommendations to multiple teams and stakeholders across the organizationContribute to the team by providing research ops support, staying tapped into emerging trends and methods, leveraging your strengths to help others grow and evolve our team, the UX Research practice and our cultureDistill complex multi-method research reports into understandable, compelling, connected and actionable insights to multiple teams/leadership levels across the business domain 1-3 years of relevant work experience (including internships) conducting research as part of an internal or agency team and/or academic studies in a relevant field (e.
• , anthropology, business, behavioral science, design, psychology)Experience with various research methods: in context qualitative research, diary studies, IDIs, moderated and unmoderated usability, and surveysExperience working firsthand with UX design and software product teams and planning UX research across the product lifecycleAbility to develop creative, flexible and rapid approaches to user experience problemsEffective communication and storytelling skills, with experience presenting to diverse audiences that translate findings into business impactStrong understanding of design thinking and user-centered practicesEnthusiasm for working in a collaborative environment with a culture of feedbackExemplary verbal, presentation, and written communication skillsAbility to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectivelyPositive attitude, bias toward iteration & action, and ability to work with Product, Engineering, and Architecture colleagues in ways that build relationships and uplift UX maturityWe also seek someone with a creative streak, a love for experimentation and the desire and skills to deliver quickly Life at Salesforce Our Locations Our Locations North America Europe, Middle East, and Africa Asia Pacific Latin America Our Teams Our Teams Sales Technology & Product Customer Success Corporate Roles AI Research University University Overview Interns New Grads Advanced Degrees Associate Program Manager Talent Programs Talent Programs Overview Future Pathways India Return to Work Military Fellows Our Story Newsroom Blog Careers Trust Salesforce.
